title: Thief of Sydney
creator_credit: Toby Zoates and Australian Film Commission. Creative Development Branch
brief_description: Animated film about a young unemployed man who dreams about adventures in a futuristic, post holocaust Sydney where he still manages to face his hopes and fears and to overcome obstacles. A discussion starter for unemployment, the nuclear debate, adolescence and society, and fears of the future.
